page.title: 12AGRICULTURAL ENGINEERING
page.content: {Goughs}started off in Connings garage next to the school.They started as a blacksmiths.Blacksmiths weld things. They started selling more things like traction engines.In the end they decided to make a building for it.Now they sell chains,toys,pens,booklets, caps,farm clothes like jackets as well as tractors,trailers,farming machinery gas bottles,and lots more. Lots of people work at{Goughs.}They have a computer.They have a video that you can watch,it is a farming video, which shows combines cutting the corn. They have a sale once a year.They sell things like tractors and combines. There is a yard and a field where they have tractors and combines and things to go on the back of tractors,like seeders,ploughs and trailers.{Goughs is at the bottom of the hill in {Hunsingore}next to {Walshford.
